org.apache.river.test.share

Class LeaseBackEndImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.share.LeaseBackEndImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Remote, net.jini.security.proxytrust.ProxyTrust, net.jini.security.proxytrust.ServerProxyTrust, LeaseBackEnd

    public class LeaseBackEndImpl
extends Object
implements LeaseBackEnd, net.jini.security.proxytrust.ServerProxyTrust
    Impl of the LeaseBackEnd remote interface for use by renewal service tests

      • renew

        public Object renew(int id,
                    long extension)
             throws net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException,
                    net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        Description copied from interface: LeaseBackEnd
        Called by the lease when its renew method is called.
        Specified by:
        renew in interface LeaseBackEnd
        Parameters:
        id - The id of this lease, used by the grantor to identify it
        extension - The duration argument passed to the Lease.renew() call
        Returns:
        If the method return a Long this is the new expiration of the lease, if it returns a Throwable that object should be thrown. If the the value is a Throwable it should be and Error, RuntimeException, or RemoteException
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException

      • cancel

        public Throwable cancel(int id)
                 throws net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        Description copied from interface: LeaseBackEnd
        Called by the lease when its cancel method is called.
        Specified by:
        cancel in interface LeaseBackEnd
        Parameters:
        id - The id of this lease, used by the grantor to identify it
        Returns:
        If this method returns a non-null value that the caller should throw that object, other wise the caller should return normally. If the the value is non-null it should be and Error, RuntimeException, or RemoteException.
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException

      • renewAll

        public Object renewAll(int[] ids,
                       long[] extensions)
        Description copied from interface: LeaseBackEnd
        Called by the lease map when its renewAll method is called.
        Specified by:
        renewAll in interface LeaseBackEnd
        Parameters:
        ids - The ids of this leases, used by the grantor to identify them
        extensions - The duration argument for each lease from the map
        Returns:
        If the method returns a RenewResults object the object should be used to update the leases in map and/or throw an appropriate LeaseMapException. If the returned value is a Throwable that object should be thrown. If the the value is Throwable it should be and Error, RuntimeException, or RemoteException.

      • getProxyVerifier

        public net.jini.security.TrustVerifier getProxyVerifier()
        Description copied from interface: net.jini.security.proxytrust.ProxyTrust
        Returns a TrustVerifier which can be used to verify that a proxy can be trusted as a proxy for the service; that is, the isTrustedObject method of the returned verifier can be called with a candidate proxy. The verifier should be able to verify all proxies for the service, including proxies for resources (such as leases and registrations).
        Specified by:
        getProxyVerifier in interface net.jini.security.proxytrust.ProxyTrust
        Specified by:
        getProxyVerifier in interface net.jini.security.proxytrust.ServerProxyTrust
        Returns:
        a TrustVerifier which can be used to verify that a proxy can be trusted as a proxy for the service
